mapper.select: SELECT i.* FROM tb_edu_athlete_selection_index i LEFT JOIN tb_edu_athlete_selection_index_cat cat ON cat.id = i.index_cat_id WHERE i.cn_name = #{cnName} AND cat.index_cat_name = #{indexCatName}
